object.name: Capabilities.
object.description: This object contains parameters relating to the hardware capabilities of the MME server.

object.name: MobilityManagement.
object.description: The MME maintains MM context and EPS bearer context information for UEs in the ECM-IDLE, ECM-CONNECTED and EMM-DEREGISTERED states.

parameter.name: UEListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: IMSI
parameter.description: IMSI (International Mobile Subscriber Identity) is the subscribers permanent identity.

parameter.name: MSISDN
parameter.description: The basic MSISDN of the UE. The presence is dictated by its storage in the HSS.

parameter.name: MMState
parameter.description: Mobility management state ECM-IDLE, ECM-CONNECTED, EMM-DEREGISTERED.

parameter.name: GUTI
parameter.description: Globally Unique Temporary Identity. To identify a UE between the UE and the MME on behalf of IMSI for security reason. GUTI (not more than 80 bits) = GUMMEI + M-TMSI

parameter.name: MMEI
parameter.description: Mobile Equipment Identity - (e.g. IMEI/IMEISV) Software Version Number. MMEI (24 bits) = MMEGI + MMEC.

parameter.name: TAIList
parameter.description: Current Tracking area list TAI of last TAU TAI of the TA in which the last Tracking Area Update was initiated. UE can move into the cells included in TAL list without location update (TA update). Globally unique. {TAI} (variable length)

parameter.name: ECGI
parameter.description: E-UTRAN Cell Global Identity. Last known E-UTRAN cell. To identify a Cell in global (Globally Unique) EPC can know UE location based of ECGI. ECGI (not more than 52 bits) = PLMN ID+ECI.

parameter.name: ECGIAge
parameter.description: Time elapsed since the last E-UTRAN Cell Global Identity was acquired.

parameter.name: AV
parameter.description: Authentication Vector. Temporary authentication and key agreement data that enables an MME to engage in AKA with a particular user.

parameter.name: UENetworkCapability
parameter.description: UE network capabilities including security algorithms and key derivation functions

parameter.name: UESpecificDRXParameters
parameter.description: UE specific DRX parameters for A/Gb mode, Iu mode and S1-mode

parameter.name: SelectedNASAlgorithm
parameter.description: Selected NAS security algorithm

parameter.name: SelectedASAlgorithm
parameter.description: Selected AS security algorithms.

parameter.name: KSI_ASME
parameter.description: Key Set Identifier for the main key K_ASME

parameter.name: K_ASME
parameter.description: Main key for E-UTRAN key hierarchy based on CK, IK and Serving network identity

parameter.name: NasKeysAndCount
parameter.description: KNASint, K_NASenc, and NAS COUNT parameter.

parameter.name: KeySetFlag
parameter.description: E-UTRAN/UTRAN Key Set flag. Indicates whether the UE is using security keys derived from UTRAN or E-UTRAN security association

parameter.name: Recovery
parameter.description: Indicates if the HSS is performing database recovery.

parameter.name: MmeIpAddressForS11
parameter.description: MME IP address for the S11 interface (used by S-GW)

parameter.name: MmeTeidForS11
parameter.description: MME Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for S11 interface.

parameter.name: SGwIpAddressForS11S4
parameter.description: S-GW IP address for the S11 and S4 interfaces

parameter.name: SGwTeidForS11S4
parameter.description: S-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S11 and S4 interfaces.

parameter.name: ENodeBAddressInUse
parameter.description: The IP address of the eNodeB currently used for control plane signalling.

parameter.name: EnbUeS1apId
parameter.description: Unique identity of the UE within eNodeB. INTEGER (0..4294967295)

parameter.name: MmeUeS1apId
parameter.description: Unique identity of the UE within MME.

parameter.name: SubscribedUeAmbr
parameter.description: The Maximum Aggregated uplink and downlink MBR values to be shared across all Non-GBR bearers.

parameter.name: UeAmbr
parameter.description: The currently used Maximum Aggregated uplink and downlink MBR values

parameter.name: RfspIndexInUse
parameter.description: RAT/Frequency Selection Priority. An index to specific RRM configuration in the E-UTRAN that is currently in use.

parameter.name: URRP-MME
parameter.description: URRP-MME indicating for HSS regarding UE reachability at the MME

parameter.name: PDNConnectionListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ApnInUse
parameter.description: The APN currently used.

parameter.name: ApnSubscribed
parameter.description: The subscribed APN received from the HSS.

parameter.name: ApnRestriction
parameter.description: Denotes the restriction on this EPS bearer Context.

parameter.name: PdnType
parameter.description: IPv4, IPv6 or IPv4v6

parameter.name: IPAddress
parameter.description: IPv4 address and/or IPv6 prefix

parameter.name: PdnGwAddressInUse
parameter.description: (control plane) The IP address of the PDN GW currently used for sending control plane signalling.

parameter.name: PdnGwTeidForS5S8
parameter.description: (control plane) PDN GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the control plane.

parameter.name: MsInfoChangeReportingAction
parameter.description: Need to communicate change in User Location Information to the PDN GW with this EPS bearer Context.

parameter.name: EpsSubscribedQoSProfile
parameter.description: The bearer level QoS parameter values for that APN's default bearer (QCI and ARP)

parameter.name: SubscribedApnAmbr
parameter.description: The Maximum Aggregated uplink and downlink MBR values

parameter.name: ApnAmbr
parameter.description: The Maximum Aggregated uplink and downlink MBR, as decided by the PDN-GW.

parameter.name: PdnGwGreKeyForUplinkTraffic
parameter.description: (user plane) PDN GW assigned GRE Key for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane for uplink traffic.

parameter.name: DefaultBearer
parameter.description: Identifies the EPS Bearer Id of the default bearer within the given PDN connection.

parameter.name: BearerListNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: BearerList.{i}.
object.description: For each bearer within the PDN connection

parameter.name: EpsBearerId
parameter.description: An EPS bearer identity uniquely identifies an EP S bearer for one UE accessing via E-UTRAN

parameter.name: TI
parameter.description: Transaction Identifier

parameter.name: IpAddressForS1u
parameter.description: IP address of the S-GW for the S1-u interfaces.

parameter.name: TeidForS1u
parameter.description: Tunnel Endpoint Identifier of the S-GW for the S1-u interface.

parameter.name: PdnGwTeidForS5S8
parameter.description: (user plane) P-GW Tunnel Endpoint Identifier for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane.

parameter.name: PdnGwIpAddressForS5S8
parameter.description: (user plane) P GW IP address for user plane for the S5/S8 interface for the user plane.

parameter.name: EpsBearerQoS
parameter.description: QCI and ARP optionally: GBR and MBR for GBR bearer

parameter.name: TFT
parameter.description: Traffic Flow Template. (For PMIP-based S5/S8 only)
